This R package was built as an assignment for the Coursera course "Building R Packages". 

It provides R functions that can be used to import, summarize and visualize 'yearly data regarding fatal injuries suffered in motor vehicle traffic crashes' that has been annually published by and publicly available for download from the Fatality Analysis Reporting System (FARS),  which is a nationwide census of US National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA).
